about_the_game:
An unexpected opportunity, you come to an uninhabited island.

The scenery here is beautiful and the resources are abundant, but there are no people here, only a group of red monsters. They have red skin and fiery tails.

But you can kill them with a gun. If you want to get an immersive monster combat experience, join us now!

Methods of Game Operations

Forward=W

Back=S

Move Left=A

Move Right=D

Shooting=Left mouse button

Gameplay

You need to use a gun to kill the monster

Please note, stay away from the monster

After being touched by a monster, you will die

Game features

Comfortable and stress free

You don't need to do tasks

Traditional realism, Chinese style is fully displayed, with exquisite objects and realistic and exquisite scenes.

The difficulty of the game is relatively high, which may require players to spend a lot of time familiarizing themselves with the operation.

Overall, on this mysterious island, you will face challenges and need to overcome them in order to kill all monsters
